Phobia instructed Bludgeon to fly ahead and recon Destructors 
location. 

Phobia checked the condition of KitKat if they didn't get help soon 
she was a goner. he hoped that they weren't walking into a 
trap.  "Bludgeon do you see anything?"

In Hurricanes case Lady Hawkconsidered him a pee-on and was to stuck 
up to acknowledge him as long as DevilDuer was present.
